fields.name: errormessage
fields.fieldText: Opportunity must have a Approved Primary quote which is Accepted by customer in order to create an order.

fields.name: ErrorMessage1
fields.fieldText:
Error: Missing required information. Please review and provide the following:

Billing Address

Shipping Address

Ship To Name

Click the button below to complete the missing details.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the PO Number if the PO is available.

Please provide transaction proof.

Please provide purchase order document.

Please enter the Transaction ID if the PO is available.
Please provide transaction proof.

fields.fieldText: Order cannot be created before the opportunity is closed won.
